C. 290.

_source.text: 18: MDS is not saying that Damon Huard has always been better than Trent Green, he is saying that in 2007 the 34-year old Damon Huard (who played like the Pro Bowl-selected Marc Bulger for half a season the previous year) will be better than the 37-year-old Trent Green (who played like Jon Kitna, Matt Leinart, Jason Campbell, and/or Kurt Warner, even with adjustments for the better pass defenses Green played against, for half a season after suffering a major concussion in the first game of that season).
